hero.core_tension: Decide whether to convert a store into a content-first branded zone for a 6 week window that trades concentrated attention for measurable sales. The mechanism is simple. Operators must pick the drop window that captures cultural momentum while keeping inventory tight.
hero.setting: Ground floor retail cluster or flagship bookstore. Clean negative space. Visible shelving and a single cleared bay framed by circulation paths.
hero.persona: Brand partnerships lead collaborating with store operations and creative director.
hero.action: Team mapping a staged branded zone, moving a single product cluster into precise alignment.
hero.urgency_symbol: Overlapping pulse bands that tighten from broad to focused, suggesting a 6 week squeeze then release.
props: fabric swatches and printed art proofs
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, soft shadow pools, and warm rim light on key objects.
hero.alt: Creative lead and store manager aligning products in a branded pop-up under polished highlights
